name: One Night at Frank's 2
description:
Welcome back.

It was foolish for you to come back to the Franken's Franchise.

Whatever. You seem to like horror anyways.

You are well equipped with top of the line security cameras, a nice, metal door, lights in the hallway, and your fear.

1 door. 1 light. 8 cameras. 2 animatronics.

Enjoy your night, while it lasts.
